snippet: The flutist Carol Wincenc and the cellist Jay Campbell played a spiky mix of classic Modernist and contemporary music on Wednesday as part of the New Music/New Places series.
lead_paragraph: The flutist Carol Wincenc and the cellist Jay Campbell played a spiky mix of classic Modernist and contemporary music on Wednesday as part of the New Music/New Places series.

headline.print_headline: From Classic to Spiky, Earthy to Ethereal
headline.seo: Carol Wincenc and Jay Campbell Perform at Robert Miller
headline.main: From Classic to Spiky, Earthy to Ethereal
